data.message: Fix promotion compactor enum serialization bug: Found root cause: sys.path prioritizes .agent/lib over local duro-mcp, so imports used the full-featured version. That version had a JSON serialization bug - asdict() doesn't convert enums, causing TypeError mid-write and truncated files. Fixed by converting enum to .value before json.dump. Two separate issues from yesterday's debug session: (1) the duro-mcp version had wrong enum names, (2) the .agent/lib version had serialization bug.
data.task: Fix promotion compactor enum serialization bug
data.outcome: Found root cause: sys.path prioritizes .agent/lib over local duro-mcp, so imports used the full-featured version. That version had a JSON serialization bug - asdict() doesn't convert enums, causing TypeError mid-write and truncated files. Fixed by converting enum to .value before json.dump. Two separate issues from yesterday's debug session: (1) the duro-mcp version had wrong enum names, (2) the .agent/lib version had serialization bug.
